column5: Going up to cooks bay for pike on wednesday! How's the fishing been this season so far? any trophies? Whats been working up there?  Thanks! Tight lines
fished a bit on the weekend, 8-13 feet of water and start chucking spinner baits, bombers, rapala husky jerks or get a big chubb minnow on a big bobber and sit back and drift ! .. Enjoy !
